metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39976 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
log_blackbox.c in libqb before 2.0.8 allows a buffer overflow via long log messages because the header size is not considered.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39976` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

doxygen2man - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1
libqb-tools - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1
libqb100 - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libqb package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1').
